# Municipality Seats

```{r}
muni_seat <- read_municipal_seat(year = 2010) |> 
  # Bring State names
  left_join(
    read_state() |> 
      as_tibble() |> 
      mutate(code_state = as.character(code_state)) |> 
      select(code_state, name_state),
    
    by = "code_state"
  )
```
